name: Tentacle Restrain
statusOutcome: {attackerName} sends out {attackerHisOrHer} numerous tentacles, and they wrap around and restrain {targetYouOrMonsterName}!
statusMiss: {attackerName} sends out {attackerHisOrHer} numerous tentacles, but {targetYouOrMonsterName} manage to keep them off!
restraintStruggleCharmed: {targetName} squirms against {attackerName}'s tentacles, barely resisting the urge to settle into the restraints...
restraintEscaped: {targetName} manages to tear off the restraining tentacles!
restraintEscapedFail: But {targetName} remains bound by the sticky tentacles!
